title: Personal Website
subtitle: HTML/CSS, javascript, react, bootstrap, npm
description: This is my personal website built mainly using ReactJS and the SPA architecture. The site also makes to requests to REST apis to pull data from a remote database and update site components.
info: This site uses the react dom to render different components that represent parts of the site. The react router is also used which aids in implementing a SPA architexture and faster page switches.
features: Displays an inspirational quote every day
A search bar that redirects queries to Google
Displays a collection of my project
